title: Can I use my 2015 12.9’ iPad Pro Smart Keyboard with the 2020 12.9’ iPad Pro? - Quora

response.answer_text: The 2015 iPad Pro 12.9″ is the 1st generation of that model, so you have to be careful when shopping for the Smart Keyboard Folio. The current Smart Keyboard Folio (model MU8H2LL/A) sold on Apple’s website is newer and is only compatible with the newer, 3rd and 4th generation iPad Pro 12.9″ models. You need to look for model number MJYR2LL/A It is no longer manufactured, so some sellers are selling refurbished keyboards and you can buy them used on auction sites. If you look hard enough, you might find a “new old stock” keyboard somewhere.
